name: Chaos Of Hearts
description: This game project has been end. Please visit the new game http://playloco.net or http://lolizen.com .
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 Bit Processor: Intel: Intel Core i3 & AMD: AMD FX X6 series. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560+ & AMD R7 260x+ DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 Bit Processor: Intel: Intel Core i5 & AMD: AMD FX X8 series. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970+ & AMD R7 370+ DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Any
